website_summaries.verdict: A must have for owners of mud-loving cats and dogs.
pros: Available in packs of 25 or 100 count
Moist wipes have a subtle but pleasant scent
Thick wipes are durable and effectively remove dirt from paws
Wipes sit at a low price point
Gentle and soothing on skin and fur
cons: Packaging can be difficult to open

customer_reviews.title: Opening sucks but it works
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before I purchased so I was aware of the issue with the opening mechanism. I used a knife to pry it open, yes it's that difficult. As for the scent I thought it was subtle and nice. I have a Boxer puppy and I just gently scrubbed his hair and it did its job. Not a deep clean but a noticeable difference. I'd purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: A. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome. Our senior Italian greyhound sometimes can't hold it ...
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. Our senior Italian greyhound sometimes can't hold it when she's in her kennel for a few hours while we're not home, so she ends up with pee on herself. We were giving her at least one bath a week, sometimes more. Which was not only a hassle, but rough on her delicate skin. The wipes make life SO MUCH EASIER!! We can just wipe her down and she's instantly clean and fresh! They're also great for muddy paws and when our boy Italian greyhound accidentally pees on his own leg
customer_reviews.author: Annie Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Barely damp. Can't recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Good idea, but I wouldn't recommend these for cleaning feet. They are definitely not wet enough for my dog's paws after a walk in the dirty city, and barely damp enough for anything. They smell good and I use them to (lightly!) wipe down his coat and legs at night to remove local pollen, etc. Also, I found the same problem that other reviewers have - several come out all at once and it's kind of a pain to have to push them back in the little dispenser, especially while holding a paw or collar with the other hand. I can't really recommend these. You might as well use a damp paper towel.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Woman

customer_reviews.title: Good for elderly dog
customer_reviews.text: We have a German Shepherd with limited mobility, so frequent trips to the groomers, or even climbing in the tub aren’t practical for keeping him clean. We just started using these, since outdoor baths are t possible with the weather change, and get definitely help with the oily fur, dirty tail, and grey dusty spots he leaves behind after leaning up against pants after coming inside. They don’t leave much residual aroma behind, and he thinks he’s being pet when we rub him down with them. Downside is it takes 3-4 to do all of him, and they tend to get dirty quicker now that his winter coat is coming in, and lose fur is coming off using them.
customer_reviews.author: C.A. Tetley

customer_reviews.title: Seriously amazing.
customer_reviews.text: They don't call this nature's miracle for nothing. Our pup has some anal gland issues (ew, I know, but if you have ever smelt it before, you know why this is relevant), and let me tell you it REAKS! These wipes are perfect for when she has some issues and secretes but we do not have time to give her a bath (on our way to work or in the car). It does not replace a bath, but makes the smell disappear until we can give her one!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Thick But Not Moist Enough
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Nature's Miracle Wipes for my dog who is recovering from surgery. First week post surgery she was having some trouble getting around and grooming herself post potty time. I liked these wipes because they are soft and thick. They lose points because they are not moist enough to thoroughly clean up your pet. I had to add water to further moisten the wipes. I would also prefer a larger sized wipes for my very large dog (100 pounds). This wipe size is okay for a quick paw cleaning. The scent is mild and not overpowering. They are a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Check It Out

customer_reviews.title: Never made it to the cat.
customer_reviews.text: The instant I opened this, my tongue immediately began to tingle in a way that people sensitive to toxins or with multiple drug/chemical hypersensitivities/allergies will be familiar with. Not everyone has these health issues, of course, but anyone experiencing a reaction like that anytime is having a reaction that should be taken seriously. The seal being opened means I can't risk handling it to send it back, so out it goes. Worth mention: NO INGREDIENTS seem to be listed on the package at all. That's a hazard sign I missed when I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Sequelae Are

customer_reviews.title: Hard to Open
customer_reviews.text: The scent is pleasant and these are my wipes of choice. However, the red tab at the top is very hard to open. I’ve struggled with it so often that most times it rips right off. Very frustrated a definite design flaw! The picture shows how once again I couldn’t open it properly so the entire package is ripped.
customer_reviews.author: RHONDA

customer_reviews.title: Nice fragrance and size. Hard to open dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Love these! The down side is that the top that is an open and snap shut type of dispenser, is soooo hard to open. Maybe we received a defective package? The plastic dispenser has now come away from the plastic container and the wipes are drying up due to the container not being entirely sealed.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Sue

customer_reviews.title: Nice scent but on the small side
customer_reviews.text: Nice scent but could be a bit larger. You get a big package of these wipes and they are thick enough only they're a tad small. They will do the job if all you have is a quick butt wipe but if your dog is really messy you'll need more. On the plus side, they don't seem to irritate my dog like some of the regular human wipes did.
customer_reviews.author: E. Constable

customer_reviews.title: Two foster dog moms love these!
customer_reviews.text: We have two of our own dogs and plenty of foster dogs passing through, many of whom are recovering from major surgeries and can’t take a bath. Others insist on eating wet food and making a big mess, or come with dirt and messes and tangles. We go through A LOT of wipes dealing with all this. These are the best value for wipes that can handle foster dogs. They smell lovely, clean as well as wipes can be expected to, and the cost is even cheaper than the odd wipes we find at Homegoods! I’ve already ordered a couple more packs for around the house and cars to keep things cleaner!
customer_reviews.author: Sonja BegoniaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Dirty at daycare!
customer_reviews.text: Winnie gets dirty playing at daycare. I can't give her a bath 3 times a week, so we use these in between. They clean up her well, smell nice and I think have limited some of the damage/dirt transfer to my furniture which is a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Awful overpowering smell
customer_reviews.text: Due to all the good reviews I bought them. What a mistake. Such a strong overpowering smell my puppy runs far distances when she smells it. Was already causing headaches for me but a dog smells things a lot more intensive. Tried it on my puppy and she kept rubbing against everything to get it off. After that I kept using them for a short time to clean puppy accidents but the smell is so bad you can’t enter the room anymore afterwards. One for the trash
customer_reviews.author: Franzi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for both post-walks and on-the-go
customer_reviews.text: Nature's Miracle is a very reputable brand and the 100-count pack on Amazon has to be the most economical you can find anywhere. I was paying 9-10 cents a wipe but this gets me at 5 cents a wipe. The wipes are decently sized and are moist. My dog really loves it when I wipe him, and he enjoys the smell of them.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Lebroski

customer_reviews.title: Packaging Hack!
customer_reviews.text: Like everyone has said, nothing beats the product at this price but the packaging sucks and is difficult to open -- this has been my easy fix, albeit a bit ugly. - Carefully separate the red plastic dispenser from the package. - DO NOT remove the plastic seal. - Tape over glue residue lines. Not only has this made opening the package way easier, it also has prevented the bottom half of the wipes from drying out.
customer_reviews.author: chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Everyday wipes
customer_reviews.text: I use these every day to wipe my dog's face and paws after his walks. After the dog park, if he isn't quite dirty enough to warrant a bath, I use 3-4 of these to clean him off, and he is good as new and smelling fresh! Both scents are nice, I have been alternating with every pack so that I don't get sick of either.
customer_reviews.author: MroTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Effective, easy to open
customer_reviews.text: I love that these wipes are easy to open and reseal. Our senior pug has disc disease and often falls in her own mess. When it's not bad enough to require a bath, these are a great quick fix. We've recently started wiping her with one every time she goes to the bathroom no matter what to prevent infection. She doesn't seem to mind them and the smell is pleasant, not too strong. I really hate fragrances and had to get rid of another brand of dog wipes because it was too strong, but these are just right. Occasionally when you try to pull one wipe out two will come out if you're not careful.
customer_reviews.author: R. Schiffman

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't purchase this again.
customer_reviews.text: I have a new young yorkie in my house. I wanted to purchase bath wipes since I can't bathe her often since she's so young and I don't want to dry her skin out. These wipes are barely damp / almost dry. I'm not sure if my package was defective? Though, it seems others have mentioned that in their reviews. It doesn't feel like I'm cleaning anything off of the puppy. My puppy is tiny and one wipe wouldn't be enough. I'm using the wipes just for her paws. The smell of the wipes don't bother me or the puppy. I don't find the smell overbearing or strong.
customer_reviews.author: lea

customer_reviews.title: My favorite brand of grooming wipes of all time
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite grooming wipes of all time. I use a lot of these since I wipe my Louie down every time after a walk. I have tried several other brands on the market, and this one is so far the best. The scent is definitely the best, so pleasant and it’s also very lasting on my dog. The wipes are fairly soft and moist, though I usually spray some water on them since I prefer them wetter. Sure, the packaging is a little, but It’s usually fine if I am careful about it. This price on amazon is truly a great deal and I will definitely come back for more!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Great wipes with inconvenient packaging
customer_reviews.text: Have ordered these a few times and the wipes are reasonably thick and clean well, plus the smell is really nice; fresh and not cloying at all. The only thing that keeps these from being 5 star is the packaging. The outer plastic seal on last package is painfully hard to open and once open I've been unable to take out one wipe at at time because they're packed so tightly that 3-4 after dispensed with each pull so there's been a lot of waste. This wasn't happening with previous packages so hoping this was one-off and not a change in packaging process. Overall, the wipes themselves are great.
customer_reviews.author: Sheeyore

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I think I left a review on these before, but the quality of the lid was much better this time. Last time, the lid I received was crooked so it wouldn't close properly all the time. As a result, some of the wipes ended up drying up before I could use them. I re-ordered these despite the slight inconvenience of the lid issue because of how good they smell. This time, the lid is fine and I'm really happy with these wipes. They are perfect for after taking my dog on walks, especially when the weather is rainy or snowy.
customer_reviews.author: HK

customer_reviews.title: Smells like NOTHING!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed in this product. I have their shampoo with the same scent and it smells amazing. These wipes literally smell like water.. nothing! the whole point of getting doggy wipes is to leave a nice scent on your dog while also clean them off. I might as well just take a paper towel and put water on it and wipe them. If I could have given this zero Stars I would. Where's the sent??? I just don't get it because the shampoo smells so good and has a strong fragrance. I guess I'm going to go back to my old wipes I will never buy these again!!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Bordegaray

customer_reviews.title: A must buy for your little one!
customer_reviews.text: I have these on auto ship as I use them daily for my sweet little Maltese that uses indoor pish pads. He gets refreshed after every pish or poo. They work great. Not too dry and not too wet. Pleasing scent. Not necessarily a great value but still a good value. If you’ve found this review helpful please hit the like button. Thank you. Stay safe everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Hawaii Customer

customer_reviews.title: The closest you can get to washing without actually doing so
customer_reviews.text: So I was very skeptical about these wipes, seemed like regular wet wipes just for x5 the price, but boy was i wrong! I have a 90 lbs doberman and there is no way i can wash him myself, and now during quarantine i couldnt bring him to the grooming place so i used these wipes in desperation and they are really really good. I dont know why they work so good but they do. I use 5-6 wipes at once and you can really tell the difference - my dog's coat is super soft and smells fresh!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Ollie’s Favorite Wipes!
customer_reviews.text: We first bought this when our beagle was only about 10 weeks old. It helped a lot when he was still a puppy getting into all sorts of things. Now, he’s about a year and two months old and we still use the wipes on him, mostly after dog parks and long walks. He’s gotten so used to us wiping him down that he doesn’t care anymore. We like keeping him clean in between baths, so this product certainly keeps the doggo smell at bay. We tried other brands but we always go back to this one. We especially love the refreshing smell! PS We hope you guys release this product in a tub or canister. Please, and thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could be more damp/higher moisture but overall not too bad.
customer_reviews.text: The smell for me isn't offensive, might not be the most pleasant when you think of cleaning your dog but it is 100x better than the smell of a dirty dog who just came back from a walk/playing outside. Opening the lid can be annoying, yes, so be prepared for that as well. Finally, the wipes weren't as damp as I would have liked, I found I use about 3-4 wipes whenever I do a quick run down on my dog (~20 lbs.). Overall, I'd give it a 3.5/5 and recommend if it's a good price. It's not amazing, but it's a useful tool to have on hand for your dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Great for post walk wipe down
customer_reviews.text: I was using this to wipe down my puppy after our long walks. It was very useful in getting dirt and grass off. I enjoyed the smell but it is somewhat faint after some time. I’m not sure if my 8 month pibble puppy liked them because he often would try to bite it out of my hand. However, he seemed to enjoy when I cleaned his belly, under his legs and his inguinal area with the wipe. I would highly recommend these
customer_reviews.author: Amir Mohebbi, MD

customer_reviews.title: He can easily go 2+ without smelling foul
customer_reviews.text: My dog stinks after long walks. Thanks to these wipes I don't feel it necessary to wash my dog every week. He can easily go 2+ without smelling foul.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Dub

customer_reviews.title: Useful, but cheaper alternatives
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I wanted some wipes for my puppy and worried about other wipes being too harsh for their skins. This was a great product all around, but I gave it a 4 stars because it is very very expensive when compared to the alternative. I was able to go to multiple dollar stores, Aldi's, Costco, etc. where you can get baby wipes for $1 for the same amount that is in each of these packages. It works exactly the same and is just as gentle on your puppy's skin. Used them for month's now with no downfall. If you want the convenience of buying online though, I'd say these are fantastic! Cheaper than buying them at Petsmart.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great for doggie cleanups!
customer_reviews.text: Good for spot cleanups. My little guy likes to pee on his front leg for some reason, so these come in handy. I also let him sleep under the covers in the winter because we keep our window open to sleep, so he gets a complete wipe down before bed. They are not as strong as I would like scent-wise, but they are pleasant smelling. They are a great size for the hand and nice and thick. I can use one side and turn it around and use the other side.
customer_reviews.author: LuLu

customer_reviews.title: Great for dirty and stinky messes
customer_reviews.text: I love these wipes. They do an awesome job getting dirt and other things off my dog. I use these wipes on my dogs paws mostly from after playing out in the rain and mud. I have had to use it when my dog got poop on herself. Both situations it got rid of it all and left nothing but a nice scent which I do not think is too strong. Also when dealing with stinky situations it's nice to have something to kill the smell. Lastly, the wipes are a good size and durable.
customer_reviews.author: SMF

customer_reviews.title: Great to use between washes
customer_reviews.text: Dog wipes are the best thing ever! When it’s been raining and we go out for a walk, I always wipe down his paws before coming inside of the house. I also use them every time we get back from the dog park. It’s great for wiping away dirt, mud, dog slobber, and for freshening up their coat between baths. The only thing I don’t like about these wipes is the packaging. It’s a little difficult to open each time.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Essential For Playful Puppy
customer_reviews.text: So I keep a pack of these by the door and a pack in the puppy's room. They are great for wiping paws and other puppy parts when he comes in from his potty break, and are a quick help to keep puppy smell at bay. He doesn't mind them at all and feels getting rubbed down is a game. But let's be honest, at 8 weeks old EVERYTHING is a game!! Still, these smell good without being overpowering, and they are so convenient. I plan to put a pack in the car as well. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy B.

customer_reviews.title: They work well
customer_reviews.text: My Dane eats all kind of stuff and I catch myself having to wipe poop oof his butt. These work well, plus if he just kind of stinks in general it’s good to wipe him down. I keep some in the car too so I can clean up the slobber.
customer_reviews.author: gary

customer_reviews.title: Great scent does not over power senses!
customer_reviews.text: Love the clean scent! I found repackage easy to open. The wipes come out easily also. They remained moist till the end. This is my second purchase and I'll be back! Neutralizes dogs odor short term. These dont replace a good bath but are excellent in a pinch or for spot cleaning. Or short trips when you dont want to smell dog in the car etc. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great for a bulldog
customer_reviews.text: Churchill gives these 2 paws up. They work great on his grungy face folds and ears. 2 wipes gets the job done and help with that "bully" musty smell he always seems to have. They definitely make his smushface more kissable.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle D Kinder

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Oh Thank you Sweet Jesus! What a blessing for my stinky dog! We try to bathe weekly, but after two days she just smells. And I was afraid these would just make her smell like wet dog....... first, I am appalled at the color of these wen I wipe her down......eeew. Who knew she was LITERALLY dirty so fast. Second, she smells better with these than even after a bath. So to whoever makes these- thank you. You don’t know how much I needed them!
customer_reviews.author: c

customer_reviews.title: Works when I can’t give a full on bath.
customer_reviews.text: I have a long coat German Shepherd puppy that has trouble keeping clean in a specific area. She’s had one bladder infection and in an effort to prevent future infections while she is still a puppy, I purchased these wipes. There are days that I can’t give her a bath like she needs but, these wipes work great in a pinch. Thank you so much. We will get thru this phase of her life.
customer_reviews.author: janet fesler

customer_reviews.title: Clean dog-happy people
customer_reviews.text: These Natures Miracle wipes are wonderful!!! Our fur baby was a rescue-unknown to us at the time, has stomach sensitivity issues. She is basically doomed to a life a soft to wetter poops and it will get on her back end fur. She however has wonderfully accepted to having a “butt” check coming into the house and if it entails a quick cleaning with these GREAT WIPES all’s good- everyone’s happy! No mess, clean, nice fragrance, easily disposed of. Plus it’s Natures Miracle!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jaweb

customer_reviews.title: Need To Use More Wipes With Recent Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I always use this on my dog after he goes outside for a walk. I usually buy multiple packs at once so that I have a pack available at all times. Unfortunately, I had to take one star away due to the decline in quality. Before, upon opening the package, the wipes would be very moist and I would use 1 or 2 wipes to clean my dog. Recently, I have to use 4-5 because the wipes are drier and it is harder to wipe down my dog. I am hoping that this is just a bad batch and that the next time I order one, it will be just like how I bought it before.
customer_reviews.author: Rinrin

customer_reviews.title: These things make us feel somewhat better about letting our dog back in our home
customer_reviews.text: Our apartment building has this artificial turf “dog run” on the roof that struck us initially as an incredible feature, given the urban setting. We soon came to understand that each time we took the dog up there, we were essentially walking around on a pee-soaked carpet — and then we would return to our apartment. These things make us feel somewhat better about letting our dog back in our home, and she doesn’t mind getting a good paw-rubdown each time we return from that rooftop urine sponge.
customer_reviews.author: Neal Obermeyer

customer_reviews.title: Nice wipes with a good smell, but poor packaging.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 6lb. Chi... to use on her feet after coming inside from muddy walks or snow when a lot of salt on the ground. I like the scent and the wipes work well. The worst part about these wipes is the packaging! Almost impossible to get the snap top to open.... and then I end up pulling out more than one wipe at a time! I wish the packaging was different and it maybe had a "one at a time" dispensing set up like wome tissue boxes. I wont buy again because of this, but I really do like the wipes themselves and will use until done.
customer_reviews.author: brokenhearted

customer_reviews.title: Smell amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are great! They smell amazing and are strong and sturdy. We originally got them to wipe down our dog after she got spayed and couldnt have a bath. I now use these between baths to freshen her up. The only bummer is that I bought them for $4.40, but the price now is $9.99. Hopefully the price decreases by time I need to buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: Great value but the scent is a little off
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are quick and easy. Pretty soft but what I dont like is the smell. It smells a bit like chemicals and it's quite 'fresh' but it sure beats a stinky dog that has been out running in the yard for hours and potentially rolled in poo. I was actually surprised by the amount of wipes that come in a package. For what I paid, it was a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Section 80

customer_reviews.title: Works great, huge sheets!
customer_reviews.text: I have a new puppy and new puppies can be messy.. so I was looking for dog-safe wipes and came across these on Amazon. First off, the price is great compared to other dog "wipes." Since this is a dog that may lick themselves, it was important for me to get a dog-safe wipe as opposed to regular baby wipes. Good price and the product is great, the wipes are moist and are a great size for big areas. For my use (wiping the dog after going potty outside) I could probably be fine with even 1/4 of the sheet.
customer_reviews.author: PB & J

customer_reviews.title: Smells good but not lasting
customer_reviews.text: What I love about the wipes is it’s priced reasonable and it smells really good, actually even better then baby wipes. It’s just a bit disappointing that it doesn’t clean really well and the smell doesn’t last. I bathed my dog 2-3 times a week during the summer but my sister said that is not recommended that is why I decided to get a deodorizing dog wipes. I also agree that it is not easy to open, you have to be a bit careful in opening the wipes if you don’t want to risk tearing the cover up. Just those minor tweaks other than that it’s worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great wipes for between baths and for paws.
customer_reviews.text: Have a large dog (>50lbs), usually use 2-3 to wipe him down between baths or on his paws to wipe off rock salt. The scent is great and leaves him fresh for a few days. Would purchase again and am happy with these wipes. Be careful opening these, the lid snaps tight (which is good) but sometimes if you pull to hard you may teat their lid from the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Easy pet hygiene solution!
customer_reviews.text: Nice large towels that are extremely durable. Easy pet hygiene solution. Great for small short haired breeds. When house dogs come in from the outdoors, sometimes they can smell. A quick wipe down and presto! Fresh smelling dogs! Help keep your house cleaner as well. Removes dust and pollen from pet hair as well. Excellent product! Second time to order. Merry Christmas! Have a Happy New Year!
customer_reviews.author: John Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Hard to open lid
customer_reviews.text: These are decent wipes and smell nice, but I absolutely hate the lid! It's so difficult to open. I'm usually trying to grab one while wrangling my tiny puppy and it annoys the crap out of me that I cannot open it with one hand. The lid doesn't easily flip up... I have to use both hands. Other products are easier to get into, similar to baby wipes etc when needed so I probably won't purchase again for that reason
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Great wipes.
customer_reviews.text: These pet wipes are great. They are inexpensive and work very well for my puppy’s paw and his puppy privates. It’s not a bad scent but I really don’t like the scent as dogs don’t want to have that type of scent on them. I also don’t like opening. It is extremely difficult to open it. I have to force them open with a lot of pressure. I wish it was easier to open.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Bad Smell
customer_reviews.text: I made a mistake. Thought I could be lazy about giving the dog baths (which he hates- and when he struggles, I hate bath-time as well.) So I thought " what could go wrong with giving him baths with wipes? They are smell SO bad. They make him smell even worse. I honestly don't know if they were defective, but this was a bad purchase on my part. They sit on a shelf and I cannot use them. Seriously, the take the smell of dirty dog, combine it with artificial smells and then you have artificial stank dog... Just give the dog a bath or find something else.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Melnick

customer_reviews.title: Received with one pack missing the red plastic sealer
customer_reviews.text: I guess they are making these too fast with no quality control. Looking ar other reviews, I see several with the same problem. I’m not going through the trouble to return them, I guess I have to find a container to put the package in. These wipes are not cheap, they should have better quality control.
customer_reviews.author: MMColli

customer_reviews.title: Too Drying
customer_reviews.text: These are really just perfume for your dog. They are extremely drying to dog and human skin! Made my dogs skin and paws really dry and scaly; and, my hand that held them was peeling after using them a few times. The citrus oils also are also not good for dogs during the summer; as they make dogs more prone to sunburn.
customer_reviews.author: N. M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome healthy cleaning wipes for dogs! Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are fantastic. I love the honey sage scent too! I got them as a ‘add on’ for dirt cheap if i spent $25.00. I had my expectations low but was totally surprised to find how awesome these are! I def will buy them again. They are the perfect size & dampness for wiping my chow chows faces after they get into messes. To clean muddy paws before tracking up the house & to clean the occasional hinny when i share a lil too much ice cream with my buddies the night before. Makes them smell great too...i highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Y.

customer_reviews.title: Truly a winner!
customer_reviews.text: These smell INCREDIBLE!!! The Honey Sage is our favorite. The wipes themselves are generous in size and super-moist. I have a 20lb Shihtzu and we only really need to use one wipe after her walks. One wipe takes care of her whole body ably. Please make sure these stay in production and available on Amazon. We've tried soooo many brands and scents and Honey Sage by Nature's Miracle is the MVP for us.
customer_reviews.author: Neruda

customer_reviews.title: these do the job
customer_reviews.text: my pup gets a wipe down after hikes as he is allowed on furniture and maybe, sometimes, kind of, intermittently sleep in the bed with me :) I will say, these are awesome, but my pup is also 13 lbs- if i had a bigger dog, these might be annoying- they're not super durable- the tear easily. i typically use 1- sometimes two depending on how dirty he is. i think it's a great value. and they smell great- not perfumey, but pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: missniche

customer_reviews.title: Good for a quick clean, no lasting scent.
customer_reviews.text: The wipes are sturdy but they do not deodorize much. I have a hound mix and in the heat... let's just say... he smells very .. male. :-) I bought the shampoo in this too and although it works well enough right out of the bath it has no lasting power. The Sandalwood/Citrus sent works much much better for dogs with strong scents. My tiny dog, a Chiweenie does much better with the wipes and shampoo as far as odor control, but she is a little lady and does not smell too much by the nature of her breeds.
customer_reviews.author: Elyzium13

customer_reviews.title: My doggie is not stinky....anymore!
customer_reviews.text: I own a Rottie and he is a workin' and playin' dog! He is only a year old and weighs 100 lbs., so he tends to get a bit "sweaty" and stinky! He also has terrible allergies, so we use these wipes daily. They don't smell like "perfume" and he seems to enjoy the "sponge bath." I'm a fan!
customer_reviews.author: HakunaMatata

customer_reviews.title: Meh, they are ok
customer_reviews.text: They leave behind a film so I'm not sure they are any better than not washing the dog. It works to wipe stuff off, but not a solution to 'cleaning' them very well since they are left with a strange goo afterwards. WON'T be buying these again. They smell nice though, so there's that.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Best Value
customer_reviews.text: I was worried because there were reviews that the scent was horrible, but I found the scent to be clean and refreshing and consistent with other "fresh" scented dog products from other brands. The size of the wipe fit my hand well and was good for my 10lb chihuahua. This is such a good price compared to others that are $2 more but for half the quantity. I will definitely rebuy this. Because of reviews saying the lid was low quality, I take care to open the lid carefully each time and have not had issues with it ripping off.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: We've been buying these for our rescue who is afraid of baths and attends doggie daycare. Sometimes she comes home a little funky and these freshen her right up without the headache of a full on bath! The honey sage scent is just right, not too strong, but strong enough to where it lasts awhile. Our dog is around 65 lbs and 2 or 3 wipes get her clean. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Liz M

customer_reviews.title: Great product, terrible packaging
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy wipes with a great scent. I love that it makes my pup smell clean after a walk. They are also durable enough for me to still scrub my dog’s paws even after rinsing it a few times to get dirt or mud off. My only complaint is the packaging. The flap is hard to open with just one hand and if I pull too hard, the entire flap comes right off the packaging. Also, the wipes aren’t folded together like other wipes so when I take one out, I have to struggle to pinch the next sheet inside the package to get it out. My dog always squirm and the packaging is hard to manage with just one hand.
customer_reviews.author: Judia

customer_reviews.title: Handy & effective
customer_reviews.text: Nice & moist, good cleansing power, scent is not overpowering. Handy for “in between” bath time or after those roll in the “who knows what” times, as well as muddy paws. We try to use microfiber cloths to be more environmentally conscious, but sometimes, it’s nice to have a quick alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Carol N.

customer_reviews.title: Easy solution to cleaning your dog than giving a bath
customer_reviews.text: My dog has a better social life than I do. He gets slobbered over everyday during his play dates, he hates getting baths and he doesn’t mind these wipes. He knows as soon as we get inside, he sits and gets wiped down with these wipes before he goes anywhere. It helps my allergies and keeps him smelling decent all week
customer_reviews.author: Spatel133

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: Just right for wiping off our shih-poo mix's paws. She is allergic to grass so we use these every time we come in the house. Also good for quick clean up of muddy paw prints, etc. Dispenser is a tad bit difficult to open, often needing two hands, but other than that the product works great. The scent is mild. Would prefer a fragrance free option just to avoid exposing her to additional chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Bateman

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Great price. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: My 6 pounds little pup has to wear belly bands at night because he has had accidents when I am sleeping. If he does go in the night. I use these wipes first things every morning and he’s fresh again. I’ve always used this brand liquid products for rugs and furniture clean up and I highly recommend. Great price and string wipes. Doesn’t rip or fall apart when using. 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Laura Hembree

customer_reviews.title: I love this product and the smell, however my dog sneeze.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product so much that made my dog smell so amazing! It does do a good job on deodorizing my stinky puppies and clean the oil on them, but the smell is too strong that make my puppies sneeze. So if they can tune down the perfume a bit, it will be a perfect product for me.
customer_reviews.author: Valorie McA

customer_reviews.title: Okay for my dog
customer_reviews.text: I use these to clean my dog’s paws after walking them. I use these at least twice a day. I like the size of it-big enough. But the first time it took me a lot of efforts to open it-maybe that is the design to prevent leaking..? I hope it to be thicker so I don’t have to use two pieces every time. Also hope the price can be cheaper since I found similar product sells $3.99 at TJ maxx. Overall okay product.
customer_reviews.author: Yue

customer_reviews.title: These wipes have a strange scent that my pets seem to detest
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why but the wipes themselves seem okay on the touch, but when I use them on my pets, they seem to hate it so much. I suspect that the wipes themselves might be sensitive to the pets, but the smell they do emit can be quite disliked by them. They are just like ordinary wet towels that I used to use to wipe off dirt from their feet and eyes sometimes, but this brand seems to not work well for them.
customer_reviews.author: BubbyInTheHouse

customer_reviews.title: Doggo deodorizer!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. The wipes are sturdy yet not harsh to use on my puppies. There is more than enough wipes to clean up any gunk or grime. I find the scent to be pleasant and not overpowering. The package itself has a very strong lid closure and the resealable feature prevents the wipes from drying out.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: A must have.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these. They work well and smell AMAZING. I bought these to cleanse the pregnant feral feline I just "adopted". She just lays there as I "deodorize" her from head to tail.
customer_reviews.author: Jeromy Stone

customer_reviews.title: NO quality control!
customer_reviews.text: The Plastic Cover Cap was glued sloppily to the OTHER side of the bag, glue was EVERYWHERE and since the cap wasn't in the right place the pull back tab was punctured and half of the wipes were dry. Shame on Amazon and the seller, what happened to quality control?
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: They are just ok
customer_reviews.text: The plastic piece on top wants to come off easily. If you are gentle with it, it may stay on for the duration that you are using the wipes. The wipes could be a bit more moist. The fragrance is ok. Probably won’t purchase again and wouldn’t recommend for anyone to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Did not like
customer_reviews.text: These are barely moist and they smell terrible and strong like a gross perfume. Wet paper towels or rag would be better.
customer_reviews.author: Jenks

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: Omg! I love these! They are perfect for my 9 week golden doodle. I live in Florida so lately it’s been super wet outside and going out to potty she gets pretty dirty with the wet sand and grass. This is a very nice smell and nothing too strong but smells very good. I’ve used these for a few days just to make sure there was no reaction, and so far so good. Got the smaller ones for the car and the home. These are great for after poopy and a good wipe to keep her fresh. Will buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Not moist enough
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these wipes before but will not be purchasing again. They are not moist enough when first opened and almost dry a week later. I purchased a spritzer spray to moisten them but it defeats the purpose of the wipes. Would not recommend and will be looking elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Pittsteel21

customer_reviews.title: Help keep my dog clean
customer_reviews.text: Doggo gets regular baths. I use these on his face instead of getting soap near his eyes. Also keep his face clean between baths with these babies. He also has occassional stomach issues, so I use these for the backend. Lastly, to clean his feet if they seem to be bothering him. They hold up. The scent doesn't bother him and I find it pleasant. Versitile wipes that I use all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Effective and sweet!
customer_reviews.text: I had reservations before buying these but I’m so glad I did. This scent is better than other brands I’ve tried before and it does the job of getting my dog’s paws clean after he runs around for an hour in the dog park. Yeah, I pull some extra ones out sometimes but that always happened with other brands too. I’m glad these were still in stock and at a normal price point!
customer_reviews.author: Kitlife

customer_reviews.title: Great wipes for keeping dogs clean between baths
customer_reviews.text: These have been a wonderful way to keep our furbabies clean between baths. The smell is fresh but not strong. The wipes are a good size and thickness so we only have to use 1 per dog for general upkeep. When they play in the dirt or just need a wipe down, one is perfect. We leave these by our back door so we can grab them as the dogs come in and do a wipe down quickly before they get in the house & on their blankets. Very happy with this product. Will be ordering my 2nd pack shortly to be sure I don't run out.
customer_reviews.author: 94Grl

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, great for post puppy potty clean up
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for post puppy potty quick clean up. We have an 9-week old miniature dachshund puppy, who is super low to the ground when she goes, so she usually is covered in dirt after outdoor potty trips. We give her a quick wipe afterwards and she smells a whole lot fresher. We also use this for general bathing and also have thewith the same scent for bath time.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice smelling wipes
customer_reviews.text: These are so helpful. I grabbed them since my dog couldn't be bathed until he was healed after his neuter surgery. We bathe our dogs once a week typically, but 2 weeks without a bath sounded awful. They have a pleasant crisp clean smell, similar to a clean linen smell. They definitely helped spot clean when our dog got dirty, and freshen up in general when he was smelly. I wouldn't rely on this as a replacement for a regular bath, but it really helped when we needed them.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lemak

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Awful container making dispensing erratic. Can never just get 1 wipe out unless you spend time on babying it out. Too perfumy of a scent making me and the dogs sneeze from time to time. Wish Amazon never took the Petkin wipes away from subscribe and save. They were just what we needed. I guess if I'd never experienced the Petkins, these could've received 3 or 4 stars. Unfortunately, with the Petkins being offered at over 3x the price of these now, we'll just have to make due until we find a better option.
customer_reviews.author: Sea Pro

customer_reviews.title: Great scent and soft
customer_reviews.text: These are a mildly scented deodorizing wipe. By that I mean the scent is not too strong, which is good. They do the job of deodorizing excellently. For the price, these are on par with more expensive wipes and I would recommend these over the others on that basis.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Fiore

customer_reviews.title: Works great for a quick wipedown.
customer_reviews.text: Our puppy is very active and really enjoys playing outside. He has a tendency to get a little bit smelly by the end of the day. We use a couple wipes at the end of the day before coming into the house and it helps to keep him smelling fresh til the next day. Definitely recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M. Fukuda

customer_reviews.title: Works great for short hair dogs, and my older girl who hates bathes. Scent is not strong at all.
customer_reviews.text: I tried this brand out compared to the competitor main brand. This one is okay, but I cannot smell the scent for much if at all. It does work well but is almost like a baby wipe if anything. The other brand I’ve tried is much better and works great on short hairs like the frenchie.
customer_reviews.author: Dabloesco

customer_reviews.title: Great Wipes
customer_reviews.text: Thick, quality wipes for dirty days at the park and on walking paths. The nice, light scent is neither overpowering nor flowery.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Great smelling, handy.
customer_reviews.text: These are great smelling and very handy for wiping little poopy butts. The plastic opening can sometimes come off when opening the product so I have used a recycled plastic dispenser from another product and now I just refill it with these so they stay moist.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Alright to use, Very thin
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my elderly dog who has to wear diapers so that we can clean him off when he's done going peepee. They work alright for him, they smell very nice but they're VERY thing, I have to use 2 each time so they deplete a little faster than some of the other thicker sheets other brands make. Overall though very nice for the price, not sure I'll buy them again or not
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doggy Musk Be Gone at an Affordable Price!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this brand and Amazon's price is much more affordable than getting these at my franchised local pet store, so as long as the price stays the same, I will keep ordering them. Even my dog (a Chiweenie) loves the smell, as I've tried other brands before and he's been known to run away when he sees me pull the wipes out. With this one, he actually comes to me when he sees me reach for them, especially after we've come back from a hot run. It really does take away that doggy musky smell.
customer_reviews.author: Jax

customer_reviews.title: Good quality wipes
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. My puppy gets into everything and I can use these wipes without giving him A full bath. Good for muddy paws, puppy faces that sniff everything etc. The fragrance is nice without being overbearing. Would repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Blair

customer_reviews.title: Loved first purchase
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product and thought it was a good value for money. However when I came back to repurchase the price is 6x higher! from $ 3.88 for 100 wipes to $22.30!! I will absolutely not purchase through Amazon at this price! Why the price gouging???
customer_reviews.author: Lorna Willis

customer_reviews.title: Sour floral + damp dog = not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Didn't really work. The package also pulled apart when opened the first time. I have 2 short hair puppies and these wipes had a pungent (almost like a sour floral) aroma. They are damp, however, they didn't help the dogs to smell better or be cleaner. Don't waste your money....there are waterless shampoos and even good old dawn dish soap would be better than these wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sticking with my Walmart brand.
customer_reviews.text: I love Nature's Miracle cleaners, so I have these a try. They smell great but they're small, and not very moist at ALL. The worst part is how ridiculously, unnecessarily difficult the package is to open every single time. I'll be sticking with the coconut-scented ones I get cheaper at Walmart and have none of these issues with!
customer_reviews.author: Oh Sugar

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I used to buy the Perfect Coat Bath Wipes but I could no longer find them at a good price. So I decided to try the Nature's Miracle wipes. Not only are these wipes great, they are much cheaper than the Perfect Coat wipes. I like how they make my dogs smell nice. They also work really well for cleaning my dogs after a walk. So far I haven't experienced a random sheet that's dry. I occasionally had the problem with the Perfect Coat Wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Quentin Moore

customer_reviews.title: Smells good
customer_reviews.text: These smell great and good for when my dog needs some freshening up. Not a replacement for baths but a good option for in between washes. Wipe ears or slight mud on the feet and stuff like that.thw price on amazon is much better than some stores too
customer_reviews.author: Anna banana

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling
customer_reviews.text: These are the best wipes for cleaning butts and generally getting rid of any doggy odors. I buy the larger pack for home use, but when I travel, I like to stick a couple of these smaller packs in my bag. I also sometimes use them on walks, especially if we're having loose stool issues.
customer_reviews.author: marian

customer_reviews.title: My dog is Pigpen from Peanuts
customer_reviews.text: My dog's favorite past time is rolling around in dirt. He is a black dog who desperately wants to be a brown dog. Can't be made because he's such a happy goober. But these make it much easier to wipe him down as opposed to full baths daily. 10/10 recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great for pup cleanup, but package malfunctioned
customer_reviews.text: Got these to wipe off my dog’s paws after playing outside or in doggy daycare. Nobody needs residue from other dogs’ business in their car or house! However...the bracket in the package is difficult to open and requires two hands. Now it’s totally ripped off and the sheets were going to dry out so I’ve had to put it in a ziplock bag.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Elizabeth, Maryland

customer_reviews.title: Works really well 💁🏻‍♀️🐶❤️🌎❤️
customer_reviews.text: Scent asside, wipes are so good. Messy pups need to be cleaned well. Scent disapates, & the moisture makes cleaning easy, & humane. Cleaning up after pup, or fur pal is so much better, with Natures Miracle than other wipes you may get on other sites.
customer_reviews.author: Fyerr

customer_reviews.title: Love these! Fresh smelling pups!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic and work well. My dogs love to lay out in the sun in the backyard but then smell like kids on the playground after laying on the ground. These wipes allow me to quickly wipe down the pups and makes them smell less like dirt and Fritos before they come back inside. You know the smell I’m talking about. 😂
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

product_meta.title: Nature's Miracle NMI07009 Deodorizng Spring Water Wipes, 100 Count
product_meta.description: Nature’s Miracle pet stain and odor removers have been a trusted brand for pet mess cleanup for more than 35 years. Whatever pets do, you can trust Nature’s Miracle stain and odor removers, training aids, disinfectants and litter products to undo.When strong dog odors start to crinkle your nose, it’s time for Nature’s Miracle Deodorizing Bath Wipes. These wipes are great for quick cleanup and between-bath refreshing to safely eliminate tough pet odors. Use them to remove dirt, dander and tough odors – they’re also enriched with moisturizing conditioners to leave your dog’s skin and coat healthy and shiny. Freshens your pup with a light spring waters scent you and your family will appreciate.This formula is gentle enough for everyday use. Just pull out these handy mild, alcohol-free wipes any time your canine companion gets a little smelly. Use only on dogs. Dispose of used wipes in the trash – avoid flushing.
feature_bullets: Quality and performance driven products for your pet
Provide a better quality of living for your pet with United Pet Group
Age Range Description: All Life Stages
Included Components: Nature'S Miracle Deodorizng Spring Water Wipes
SPRING WATERS SCENT: Leaves your dog smelling fresh and clean.
